stanza.line: How can I then return in happy plightplight
That am debarred the benefit of restrest
When day oppression is not eased by nightnight
But day by night and night by day oppressedoppressed
And each (though enemies to either reign)reign)
Do in consent shake hands to torture meme
The one by toil the other to complaincomplain
How far I toil still farther off from theethee
I tell the day to please him thou art brightbright
And dost him grace when clouds do blot the heavenheaven
So flatter I the swart-complexioned nightnight
When sparkling stars twire not thou gild the eveneven
But day doth daily draw my sorrows longerlonger
And night doth nightly make grief length seem strongerstronger
